name: Spectral Adventure
description:
In this 2D Platformer, you explore the mysterious cave by using Ghost to detect unreal traps and Twiggy to fight vicious enemies.

Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 Submission. (Theme: "It's not real")

Team:

Issam Aldahman (Solo)

Assets Credits:

Art: grafxkid, essssam, and ankoussee26 

Music & Sound Effects: Tallbeard Studios, DUSTYROOM
